title: A particular tag stopped appearing for me since 2021
content:
In our company, we are using Thunderbird tags to tag e-mails for particular employees to read/work on/answer. We are all using the same main work e-mail account (we are an internet store), just sign our replies with our respective names.

This worked for years, but then after September 2021 one of the tags (3rd) stopped working for me on all my computers (I work remotely from home), while it still shows for the rest of the employees on the computers at the office.

I still see all the e-mails from before Sept 2021 with this tag as correctly tagged. Everything from past that point the other employess successfully tag and see as tagged, while I see these messages as not having any tag at all.

In the hopes that it's some bug within my Thunderbird (currently 102.12.0) I installed the Beta 115.0b3 version as a separate entity and configured it from the scratch... The issue persists.

My config below. What am I doing wrong? All the other tags are configured in exactly the same way and they work properly.
creator: snowblindn3ss

title: In CardBook, using the standard dialog to conect to a new contact database, iCloud hangs and never populates.
content:
Platform TB: 102.12.0 Build ID:20230604001933

Edition Windows 11 Pro for Workstations Version 22H2 Installed on ‎9/‎21/‎2022 OS build 22621.1848 Serial number USH117L52C Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.22642.1000.0 Device name WS-Z8-G4 Processor Intel(R) Xeon(R) Gold 6240 CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.59 GHz (2 processors) Installed RAM 384 GB (383 GB usable) Device ID CE8E10D5-24B2-48E7-BAA7-92516161F230 Product ID 00391-50000-00000-AAOEM System type 64-bit operating system, x64-based processor Pen and touch No pen or touch input is available for this display

What happened I attempted to add an iCloud contact database to CardBook. It was one of the options. I had TBSync and Card/CalDav installed but saw that iCloud and Apple appeared support.

First mistake was I did not have an app specific password handy, and forgot I needed one, so I tried my Apple password twice. It failed to validate. Then I either read the instructions that I needed an app specific password and generated one from the iCloud website. Once I put that in, it validated fine and it looked like it was going to sync. It never finishes syncing or displaying any contacts. See attached screenshot.

That was yesterday afternoon, it is now twelve hours later.

When I right click on the the iCloud contact list, I cannot delete it / unsubscribe.

I need help first in getting rid of it, and second knowing if there is a way to get it into CardBook.

Any and all help is gratefully appreciated.

Dave
creator: dpalmer1

title: Missing sent messages
content: I occasionally send out large group e-mails on industry news and for some reason I can never see these in my sent folder. Sometimes I want to find one and resend it to someone but it's not there. Where do they go? Can I change something so I can see them?
creator: mary100661

title: Teams Invitation - no ticket / you are not on the guest list
content:
When ever I receive a Teams meeting invitation (might apply also to other mails with appointment information attached, I guess it is an ics-file) and try to accept, I get the message: "No ticket? You are not on the guest list yet". The exact wording might be a bit different, since I'm translating it from German. Then all mail addresses configured in Thunderbird are offered for the response to the invitation. In fact I'm on the list on invitees, otherwise I wouldn't have received the invitation. It's actually not a big deal, I can select the correct mail address and send the answer. But it is a bit annoying and not completely obvious why Thunderbird behaves this way.

Thanks.

Christian
creator: cortlieb

title: GoDaddy email address no longer working in firefox
content:
Dear Mozilla,

I have been a long term user/donator. Over the last few days my GoDaddy account which is linked to office 365 in some way has stopped working. I recieved this email not long before the address became inactive.

There are email accounts in your organization using Basic Authentication, which Microsoft will no longer support after 06/19/2023. You'll still be able to access your email through your browser, but not from an email app, such as Outlook or Apple Mail — don't worry, none of your emails will be lost.

In order to continue using your email apps, you need to update your settings from POP/IMAP to Exchange for each device you use to check your email. This also applies to other users who are set up within your account using POP/IMAP settings.

It appears I need to change the settings to "exchange"? Could you please advise me how to do this?

Thanks in advance, James

content:

Does clean up (expunge) inbox on exit remove emails from Thunderbird, server or both?
creator: david17361

title: Feature Request: Allow double quotes (or other method) to do exact search in Global Search
content:
The Global Search is great. I have many email accounts and folders and do not always remember where an email is located, so for me, Global Search is much faster than Classic Search.

I suppose faceted search may be useful if something is misspelled or you do not remember the tense. More often than not, I want an exact search, not one where multiple words are included.

Please add the functionality of double quotes or other method to do an exact match search in Global Search.

Thank you
creator: randall.sulkin

title: Tags not syncing in windows 11
content: I have 5 computers accessing the same email account on all the windows 10 computers everything works perfectly and has for years. On the 5th computer it is running windows 11 and while all setting are identical the tags are out of wack, they are the same color and in the same order on all the computers, but any tags from the windows 10 computers are misread on the 11 and come out wrong and vise versa. I don't get why if tag 4 is the same on all the computers the windows 11 thunderbird tag 4 comes out tag 6 on my windows 10 computers.

title: How to transfer old emails from a Thunderbird POP account to new Thunderbird Owl-EWS account
content:
Hey, I recently had to switch my email accounts, which use Office.365 servers, from using a POP account to Exchange, as apparently Microsoft stopped supporting POP. I have a new install of Thunderbird 102.12 (running on Windows 10). I have installed the OWL add-on, so the email accounts are now using "OWL-EWS" server protocol. Everything works fine, as far as my different email accounts sending and receiving new emails.

My problem is trying to import my old 20+ years of emails and the whole folder heirarchy from all my past clients and business dealings into the new install of Thunderbird. I have tried using the import method with various file types, I have tried just copying the folders in manually. Nothing seems to work, I either get errors or Thunderbird just doesn't recognize the old folders.

FYI - I also have bought the full paid version of the Thunderbird Migration Wizard software from recoverytools.com. With this, I can change my old emails folders/files into practically any format.

What is the proper way to import my old stuff??? This is driving me crazy and really killing my business productivity.

I would appreciate any pointers, I can't be the only one having issues with this.... thanks!
creator: chris554
